title: Lucky-La-Kiss
sinopse:
Luck that gets replaced with a kiss? Mirika Tamao has been super lucky from the moment she was born. And when she kissed the 'Not-so-lucky' handsome Ichinose, her luck got replaced?! A destined love that starts with a kiss.

(Source: Ikemen Guys)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Renai Hensachi 35
